titleStmt.title: The Dæmon of Burton, or, A true relation of strange witchcrafts or incantations lately practised at Burton in the parish of Weobley in Herefordshire certified in a letter from a person of credit in Hereford.
titleStmt.author: J. A.

notesStmt.note: The letter is dated and signed at end: Hereford 1 March 1670, J.A.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
